name: CoincheBox
short_description:
This Java application is a coinche game. Rules and may description of this french game may be found on internet or inside the application.
I made this game alone to practice Java but some developers who like this game can freely try to improve it or use my codes.
One of the things I wanted to do but abandoned is adding a network-playing functionnality, because at this time you can only play alone vs bots.
Other thing that could be done is trying to make better bots.

Other usefull informations :
- the code is in English but the game's content is in French
- everything is encoded in ISO-8859-1 (it was before I discovered UTF-8)
